programs.title: Parent Advocacy
contents: The Joseph Center Adult Advocacy Program (JCAAP) is for parents in transition and in crisis, by partnering with local and state organizations for the purpose of helping families create a stable and healthy home environment.
The JCAAP brings a support system to parents who have and who are in danger of losing their children by helping them reach their treatment and plan goals.
programs.goal: Our goal is to promote adult advocacy as a significant need in our community.
